name: The Witch and The 66 Mushrooms
storyline: A brother and sister trapped by the Wicked Witch One rainy night, we worked together to defeat the witch But the witch's evil spirit remains and takes the body of her brother The soul of the extruded brother was crushed by the witch and turned into 66 pieces The girl picked up a witch's hat left on the floor Determined to save his brother with magical powers.
summary: This is an exploratory 2D action-adventure game in which players explore vast stages while making use of a variety of weapons. The game was developed using Pixel Game MV, which allows anyone to easily create action games.
